Audio.Locality: Km12, Piste de la Crique Dardanelles, Mana
Audio.Author: Jon King
Audio.Comments: Distance to mic. 9m. Natural song at dusk given from thin horizontal branch 4.0m above ground. Phrases more rapid than dawn song by same individual (26/12 recording). One sequence from 20+ mins of near-continuous song, moving between perches about every 5-7 mins. Old growth lowland forest with history of selective logging, open understorey.bird-seen:yesplayback-used:no
